org.polarsys.chess.validator.managers

Class AddDiagramElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.polarsys.chess.validator.managers.AddDiagramElement

  • public class AddDiagramElement
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class AddDiagramElement contains Commands to create new elements in the model and adds them to the current diagram, if possible
